According to shape [shp:A], values of property path [def:p] must have one of the following language tags: en-uk,en-us.

Your node [id:c] currently violates this shape. It has value [1] for property path [def:p].

[shp:A] https://triplydb.com/Triply/sh/model/shp/A
[def:p] https://triplydb.com/Triply/sh/model/def/p
[id:c]  https://triplydb.com/Triply/sh/id/c
